<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataEC extends data { const CODE = 'EC'; const PREFIX = 593; const REGION = 'South America'; const PATTERNS = array( '1800\d{6,7}|(?:[2-7]|9\d)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '[2-7][2-7]\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '964[0-2]\d{5}|9(?:39|[57][89]|6[0-37-9]|[89]\d)\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '1800\d{6,7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '[2-7]890\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2-$3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{4})(\d{3})(\d{3,4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
